info.title: HYAS Insight
info.description: HYAS Insight provides On-Demand Enrichment of Passive DNS, Dynamic DNS, Passive Hash, SSL Certificate, Device Geo (Mobile Geolocation), Sinkhole, and Whois endpoints using the HYAS Insight enrichment API source.

datetime.description: The first seen date of the sinkhole

last_seen.description: The last seen date of the sinkhole

organization_name.description: The isp organization for the ip

sink_source.description: The ipv4 of the sink source

post.summary: Retrieve Sinkhole Information for IP Address
post.description: Retrieve on demand Sinkhole enrichment data for IP Address

ipv4.description: IPv4 Address you want to enrich
ipv4.title: IPv4 Address

default.description: A list of mobile geolocation information

datetime.description: a date-time string in RFC 3339 format

device_user_agent.description: The user agent string for the device

geo_country_alpha_2.description: The ISO 3316 alpha-2 code for the country associated with the lat/long reported

ipv4.description: The ipv4 address assigned to the device. A device may have either or ipv4 and ipv6

ipv6.description: The ipv6 address assigned to the device. A device may have either or ipv4 and ipv6

latitude.description: Units are degrees on the WGS 84 spheroid

longitude.description: Units are degrees on the WGS 84 spheroid

wifi_bssid.description: The BSSID (MAC address) of the wifi router that the device communicated through

wifi_ssid.description: The SSID (name) of the wifi network that the device communicated through

post.summary: Retrieve Device Geo Information for IPv4 Address
post.description: Retrieve on demand Device Geo enrichment data for IPv4 Address

ipv4.description: IPv4 Address you want to enrich
ipv4.title: IPv4 Address

domain.description: The domain of the passive dns information requested

first_seen.description: The first time this domain was seen

country_iso_code.description: Country ISO code of the ip organization

country_name.description: Country name of the ip organization

location_latitude.description: The latitude of the ip organization

location_longitude.description: The longitude of the ip organization

postal_code.description: The postalcode of the ip organization

ipv4.description: The ipv4 address of the passive dns record

ipv6.description: The ipv6 address of the passive dns record

last_seen.description: The last time this domain was seen

sources.description: A list of pDNS providers which the data came from

post.summary: Retrieve Passive DNS Information for Domain
post.description: Retrieve on demand Passive DNS enrichment data for Domain

a_record.description: The A record for the domain

created.description: The date which the domain was created

created_ip.description: The ip address of the account holder

domain.description: The domain associated with the dynamic dns information

domain_creator_ip.description: The ip address of the domain creator

email.description: The email address connected to the domain

post.summary: Retrieve Dynamic DNS Information for IP Address
post.description: Retrieve on demand Dynamic DNS enrichment data for IP Address

ip.description: IPv4 Address you want to enrich
ip.title: IPv4 Address

domain.description: The domain of the passive hash information requested

post.description: Retrieve on demand Passive Hash enrichment data for IP Address
post.summary: Retrieve Passive Hash Information for IP Address

ipv4.description: IPv4 Address you want to enrich
ipv4.title: IPv4 Address

related_count.description: The number of ip addresses connected to this certificate

ip.description: The ip address associated with certificate

expire_date.description: The expiry date of the certificate

issue_date.description: The issue date of the certificate

issuer_commonName.description: The common name that the certificate was issued from

issuer_countryName.description: The country ISO the certificate was issued from

issuer_localityName.description: The city where the issuer company is legally located

issuer_organizationName.description: The organization name that issued the certificate

issuer_organizationalUnitName.description: The organization unit name that issued the certificate

subject_commonName.description: The subject name that the certificate was issued to

subject_countryName.description: The country the certificate was issued to

subject_localityName.description: The city where the subject company is legally located

subject_organizationName.description: The organization name that recieved the certificate

subject_organizationalUnitName.description: The organization unit name that recieved the certificate

subject_stateOrProvinceName.description: The state or province name where the subject company is located

post.description: Retrieve on demand SSL Certificate enrichment data for IP Address

ip.description: IPv4 Address you want to enrich
ip.title: IPv4 Address

domain_2tld.description: The second-level domain of the registrant

domain_created_datetime.description: The date and time when the Whois record was created

domain_expires_datetime.description: The date and time when the Whois record expires

domain_updated_datetime.description: The date and time when the Whois record was last updated

name.description: The contact name (registrant contact, administrative contact, technical contact, or abuse contact)

phone.description: The phone number of the registrant in e164 format

state.description: The state where domain was registered
